ygData.subject: Re: terrible terrible bug with pets :( (DOT bug not pet?)
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/29/99 1:54:38 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I am sorry to say.... It was probably not your pet...  but the Good old fashioned DOT bug. I
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/29/99 1:54:38 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
markm@... writes:

> I hit him with Dooming Darknes, and Boil blood, both stuck
> (thank goodness) but he resisted my shock of poison! oh no! out of mana.
> BUT! Here comes my pet to save the day!!! (or so I think) The pet starts
> beating on the zombie and I run a bit to let the DOT's do their work.

I am sorry to say....

It was probably not your pet... but the Good old fashioned DOT bug.

I think that more likely than it dying from your pet.

Sonoroud Tomebinder
